MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A severe chronic disease caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), characterized by the progressive failure of the immune system, allowing life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 获得性免疫缺陷综合征（艾滋病）。一种由人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）引起的严重慢性疾病，特点是免疫系统逐渐衰竭，导致致命的机会性感染和癌症得以发展。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Effective antiviral treatments have transformed AIDS from a death sentence into a manageable chronic condition.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 有效的抗病毒治疗已将艾滋病从死刑转变为一种可控的慢性疾病。
